title: Community Contradiction Detector
reason: We need this skill because real-world feedback loops are necessary for continuous alignment. This specific skill catches internal and external claim conflicts early.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Community Contradiction Detector`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to community trust loss and unaddressed concerns.
Design and version the input/output contract for feedback channels, sentiment, urgency, and follow-ups, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using cross-claim consistency checks, and produce contradiction alerts with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover community trust loss and unaddressed concerns, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
